subject: Colleges and Universities
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Three Syracuse men’s basketball players, who had been accused of sexually assaulting a female student, appeared before a university judicial hearing board on Monday that will rule on whether the players violated the university’s code of conduct. An Onondaga County grand jury decided two weeks ago not to criminally charge the players Jonny Flynn, Antonio Jardine and Rick Jackson. The Syracuse spokesman Kevin Morrow said university officials would announce their decision within five business days.
